column2: This character is a sworn member of the Night's Watch, and may not marry nor hold titles.
This character is an honorable individual, who upholds and respects their customs regardless of how they may feel.
This character is dishonorable and so holds little regards for the traditions and customs of their people.

Incredibly charismatic, this character feels little emotion and has little concern for anyone but themself. They tend to garner support from far and wide, and manipulate people with ease. However, those close to them quickly learn that they are not what they seem.
This character is kind and compassionate and treats all those around them with compassion. Those close to them come to love them, and those from afar have much respect for them.
Brutal and cruel, this character is often described as heartless.
This character has trouble making decisions, and often makes decisions that others view as irrational at best.
This character has a formidable presence
This character is taller than the average human.
This character is shorter than the average human.
This character is widely regarded as being intelligent due to their ability to solve and understand people and problems.
This character has a strong physique, fighting off diseases and illness far more easily.
This character has a poor physique, and so struggles to fight off diseases and illness.
This character can easily use both hands for any task, from writing to sword fighting.
This character is sympathetic of followers of the Seven
This character is sympathetic of Westerosi Pagans
This character is sympathetic of followers of the Drowned God
This character is sympathetic of followers of Eastern Religions
This character is sympathetic of followers of the Valyrian religion
This character is sympathetic of Eastern Pagans
Secretly Following the Lady of the Waves
Secretly Following the Lady of the Waves
Secretly Following the Beyond the Wall Old Gods
Secretly Following the Beyond the Wall Old Gods
Secretly Following the Maiden of the Harvest
Secretly Following the Maiden of the Harvest
Secretly Following the Reformed Bearded Priests
Secretly Following the Reformed Bearded Priests
Secretly Following the Reformed Boashi Faith
Secretly Following the Reformed Boashi Faith
Secretly Following the Lady of the Rocks
Secretly Following the Lady of the Rocks
This character serves as a page for a Knight.
This character is a squire to a Knight, and either finds purpose in the role of a squire, or seeks to one day become a Knight themselves.
This character is officially recognized as a Red Knight, a valiant warrior of the Red Faith of R'hllor and has been knighted by one of their own.
This character is officially recognized as a Dragon Knight, a stalwart defender of the Valyria faith, decorated with medals and awards. They have been knighted by one that is of the Blood of Valyria.
This character is officially recognized as a Knight of the Seven Faith, and has been Knighted by a Knight or by the Grandmaster of the Order.

A Hedge Knight, named for the fact they are often found in hedges. Although Hedge Knights may not be universally so run down, it is a term applied to anyone that has been Knighted under conditions not seen as valid by 'true Knights', and they may never validate their position - even if they convert to a more proper faith. They are Ser only in name, even if it garners a little respect with certain classes.
This character has earned a reputation as a fearsome raider.
This person is a slave, considered property to a more fortunate individual.
This person has escaped the bondage of slavery.
This person owns slaves, a very expensive commodity.
This character is a figurehead, they have little to no power. It would require much skill in intrigue and diplomacy to change this.
This character is a member of the male clergy of the Faith of the Seven.
This character is a member of the female clergy of the Faith of the Seven.
This character has dedicated her life to honoring the dead and fallen.
This character is a member of the clergy of Rhllor.
The character has been drowned, as a result of this they have dedicated their life to the Drowned God.
This character is a Bearded Priest.
This character is a Septon of the Faith of the Seven.
This character has pledged their life to assist the passage of deceased members of the faith to the afterlife.
